Desc.entry: A registered charity which runs a community support service providing practical and emotional support for people with mental health problems living in their own home in Sheffield. Manages an accommodation service providing support throughout Sheffield. Includes a supported accommodation project for single people in shared and self-contained properties and supported accommodation for families. Also runs a befriending service for people with mental health needs who are socially isolated. Befrienders provide one-to-one support and help to access community facilities e.g. visiting the cinema or going for a coffee. Runs a support group for people with obsessive compulsive disorder (see separate entry). The service is available weekdays, evenings and weekends. There are charges for some services which may be payable through self directed support
